title: file-options not shown after file-update through web-interface
body:
### expected behaviour
upload file through web interface, overwrite existing file, access file options menu (version, download, delete, etc...)

### actual behaviour
after overwriting the file, options menu does not show up anymore on hovering. need to reload the page.

### steps to reproduce
see above

### server configuration
operating system:
debian wheezy
web server: 
apache
database:
mysql
php version:
5.4.4
owncloud version:
5.0.7
### client configuration
browser: firefox 21

operating system: windows 7

### logs
#### web server error log
no access
insert your webserver log here
no access

#### owncloud log (data/owncloud.log)
```
do not think it is relevant:
error 	hook 	error while running hook (\oc\files\cache\updater::renamehook): sqlstate[23000]: integrity constraint violation: 1062 duplicate entry '2-47df9d93443cb1ef5135273f199095bd' for key 'fs_storage_path_hash' 
```

#### browser log
```
[10:04:54.088] post https://myserver.xxx/owncloud/index.php/apps/files/ajax/upload.php [http/1.1 200 ok 998ms]
[10:04:55.148] get https://myserver.xxx/owncloud/index.php/apps/files/ajax/mimeicon.php?mime=application%2fmsword [http/1.1 200 ok 296ms]
```
